lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I want to give thanks in a tangible way for the good things in my life. Although I am a hard worker, many of the opportunities available to me exist simply because of where I happened to be born within the world. I want to share with other hard workers who need some help.
lender.occupational_info: I am self-employed and use the internet to sell items at a discount or items that people may have difficulty finding in regular stores.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: It is easy to help out in $25 increments and I love that the small businesses pay it back so I can give to another business in need.

lender.name: Jennie
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Shetaye
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because:
Someone helped me as a single mom of 4 teenage boys, I want to be able to help someone else not only survive but also to achieve any goals and dreams they may have.
And what an awesome way to help someone help themselves.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Just an extension of my belief in people.

lender.name: My Digital Phoenix
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others rise from the ashes.
lender.occupational_info: Located in Lafayette, Lousisiana We Supply Refurbished Computers, In-Home Technical Support, and Training.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I love helping other people succeed in business because one day they can help me if I need it

lender.name: Johnathon
lender.loan_because: It's good to support and help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I make music and tour around the U.S. and Europe.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: This is a big big world. There are so many people who have wonderful dreams to make their lives and community better, and not the means to make it a reality. I'd like to help. It's good karma too.
lender.occupational_info: I cut , color and style hair. I talk to people all day about life and the world and anything else they want to talk about. I'm also a student studying nursing.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: it's gratifying to be part of a world-wide community where small loans make huge differences in people's lives.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: If I can make a different in someones like, that will be the best thing to do.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I live to try do God's will to the best of my ability

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I run my own home-based publishing company, focused on mixed-media art.

lender.name: katie
lender.loan_because: I care about other people that are less fortunate than myself!
lender.occupational_info: I look at peoples hearts using an ultrasound machine. I work in a very large hospital. I have three grown children and I am divorced.

lender.name: Rich & Kathy
lender.occupational_info: We grow Almonds in the Sacramento valley using drip irrigation.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: I believe in business.

lender.name: coreen
lender.loan_because: I saw such horrible poverty on a recent trip to Peru. I just wanted to help any way i could.
lender.occupational_info: i teach 5 year olds how to read and write.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I feel honored that I am able to give a helping hand to those who are working so hard to reach their goals.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: pilot

lender.name: Paula & Tina
lender.occupation: Co business owners of a party store

lender.name: Shea Agnew
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student at Centre College in Danville, KY.

lender.name: Vonda
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human race.
lender.occupational_info: I work with cancer patience.

lender.name: Walt
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people need a helping hand, not a handout. I like being part of the helping hands.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: I think that anyone who works hard to better their family's life as well as their own should be provided the opportunity to rest as well.
lender.occupational_info: I do a mixture of teaching at a university and consulting

lender.name: MalcGnome (Grami)
lender.loan_because: each loan repaid means another person has helped himself to do better. It is my hope that my small token makes a big difference in each life. May each of you find success and prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. My work now is enjoying life and being a Grami. My children, their spouses, and my 3 delightful grandchildren contribute to my enriched life.

lender.name: Chris & Kate
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. We live in a place where we can earn this money back in a couple days. For the folks we loan to, this money opens up a world of opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Chris helps companies use computer software to make their businesses run more smoothly. Kate is an expert in advertising and marketing. Our most important job is as parents.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to start a business and need someone to believe in you enough to help you wih the money to get going. I want to pass it on!!
lender.occupational_info: I own and run a 110 year old victorian mansion as an inn for 11 years. I meet people from all over the world!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to empower men and women to help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit senior executives for investment banks all over the world.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel great to be a small part of the borrower's success. It makes me feel connected in an impersonal world.
lender.occupational_info: CEO of an investment management company

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: I can help in a way that others have need.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure the children at our school are in their classroom and are healthy

lender.name: Suzanna
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by the hard work of the business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I help people stay healthy and take care of them when they're sick.

lender.name: Tameka
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have a little, but still want the best for you and your family. Everyone needs a helping hand at some point in their lives and I want to give back in a way that I know will do someone some good.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I can. For the cost of one night out, I can help to vastly improve someone else's life. Why wouldn't I want to do this?
lender.occupational_info: I trim horse's feet keeping them sound and healthy.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sherilyn
lender.loan_because: I love helping people. I have made a career of it and I think I can contribute to this wonderful idea.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of patients after they have surgery on the bones in the body. I work at a world renowed hospital in Boston, Massachusetts

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals who are trying to succeed. The things that we spend 25.00 on are so less valuable that what it can do for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in my second year of college. I am studying Interior Design, and one day hope to start my own furniture/textile design company.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: lending helps open the petals of the flower of our full human potential. (I just made that up all by myself.)
lender.occupational_info: I help old ladies find a place to sit. I make strange environments seem comfortable. I answer questions about foreign countries, schedules and the weather. I try to make sick people feel better.I am prepared to save lives, if necessary. And I serve a lot of coffee.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs an opportunity...a chance....I want to give them that chance, however small.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: its the little things that matter...

lender.name: Maricela
lender.occupational_info: I work to conserve endangered species.

lender.name: Jeneva
lender.loan_because: People have helped me get my business going, so this is a way to pay it forward.

lender.name: Shaun & Monica
lender.loan_because: It allows me to help other people I would never be able to meet.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and service Honda cars and trucks.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: We all have the capacity to give and to help others in need and I would like to make a difference in someone elses life.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase production materials, supplies, spare parts, etc. for use in our factory.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in America. I came to this country from Jamaica when I was 5 years old. I believe that we are all here to help enrich the lives of others in anyway we can.
lender.occupational_info: I take calls from people who need technical help with their computer.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others. I've been very blessed in my life. My success and acheivements would not be possible if it wasn't for the help and support of family and friends. We all are here to help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a pharmaceutical company. I manage the doctor office's that run our clinical trials. Trials are conducted on groups of people before the FDA approves the drug to be sold on the market to ensure that they are safe to use.

lender.name: Shadab
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: Help heal

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I was a single mother and struggled throughout my life to support my daughter and myself. I lost my father at the age of 7, my mother at the age of 18. I never gave up inspite of it all. I worked hard, put myself through college, graduating after 19 years of working at it - the same year my daughter graduated from college. I loan because I know the struggle. But I also know the rewards because of hard work, determination, drive, passion, caring.
lender.occupational_info: I started my own business in 2005 doing accounting for various companies that need only a few hours per week, or month, and don't need a bookkeeper or accounting full-time. I left a full-time position not knowing whether this would work or not to sustain me. I now have 13 clients that are very diverse in their businesses. Some have come and gone but there always seems to be another that comes my way. It is the most rewarding work I have done in this field in over 35 years of accounting.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I like to help people

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it is a small, yet significant investment in a fellow human's future
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer historic streetcar (trolley) motorman

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: You can help the world around you more by opening your hand than closing your fist. I know that with the little I have I can help someone who has even less and that makes the circle.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse caring for the uninsured and underinsured who are unable to access healthcare

lender.name: lenchi and margo
lender.loan_because: my wife margo and i would like to help pepole realize their dreams
lender.occupational_info: i work making people feel beautiful ,my wife , margo gives me inspiration and strengh.

lender.name: Constance
lender.loan_because: I know I can make a difference, especially to women who want to make their lives better for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I design books, pamphlets, newsletters and other printed materials. I also design logos for businesses. I am a published writer and am working on a novel.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.occupation: Behavior Specialist with Special Needs Children

lender.name: Darshana
lender.occupation: Crisis, Conflict, Relationship Coach and Healer

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I can. What a wonderful concept to help those who are actively working to create a better life and a better world. Thank you Kiva! It's nice having a connection to people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the correctional system assisting individuals to transition back into the community.

lender.name: Trisha
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of the solution
lender.occupational_info: small animal emergency medicine

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should be given a chance to live out their dreams and doing something nice for someone will hopefully lead to them doing something nice for someone else as they are able.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to succeed in life, no matter how large or small the business.
lender.occupational_info: I help protect our environment and the water and air we drink and breathe.

lender.name: Aire Libre Publishing
lender.loan_because: Charity is the soul's way of extending itself.
lender.occupational_info:
Aire Libre Publishing & Computing Ltd. is a privately owned corporation, dedicated to advance knowledge, Self Realization and evolving of the Human mind and heart. Our latest is a booklet about: Every Human-Being's Life is based on a strong foundation. We identify 7 Pillars as the major points of strength.
The Essential Companion is your key to these 7 Pillars and understanding them. It also gives you 7 Tools to use in your life, so you may consciously rely upon the 7 Pillars with ease, Read More on http://theessentialcompanion.com

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that want to do better for themselves.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help women who are making an adoption plan for thier children develop a successful plan.

lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to give back. I've been blessed and I believe the more you give to others the more you recieve in return.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a hair stylist and have been doing this type of work for 20 yrs now.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I have enough money and would like to share some of it helping people live their dreams and have a better life
lender.occupational_info: I am a hospice nurse. I take care of people who are dying.

lender.name: Laura W
lender.loan_because: I believe that if we all work together we can make a difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: Self Employed

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: Kudos to Kiva for providing a mechanism for people to make meaningful change in the world!
lender.occupational_info: I help educational institutions, government agencies, and other organizations develop, design, and implement e-learning programs and materials. e-Learning is also known as distance education or online learning.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."
Winston Churchill
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time mother. I work part time from home on special projects for my company.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: We, as a family, are so blessed that the least we can do is help those who are not so fortunate. If everyone who could help, did help, the world would be a better place for so many.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Because there are those in need. Because there are those who believe. Because we all can make a difference, $25 (or more!!!) at a time.

lender.name: Stella and Mike
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way for us to help someone else out.

lender.name: Bertina
lender.loan_because: I like to help people get ahead, I still believe that there is good in this world, WE need to magnify.
lender.occupational_info: I write loans for people to buy homes and business' to buy buildings, I also help small business owners get started.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's important to be kind and do good in this world and when one has good fortune it is a responsibility to spread it to others who need help.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who want to make a better life for themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes medical products

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I believe in dreaming and creating your own reality.
lender.occupational_info: I help people keep their teeth healthy and clean.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to give others an opportunity to change their lives through a belief in their dreams and the necessary assistance to begin. We all need the support of people who believe in our dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I use my writing to help others heal their grief.

lender.name: Kerri & Nicolas
lender.loan_because: it gives people a chance to improve their lives and the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: We assist people in buying and selling homes.

lender.name: Richardson Family
lender.loan_because: It is our human responsibility
lender.occupational_info: doctor

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed to be a blessing
lender.occupational_info: I'm a husband, a father, a pastor and someone who has learned firsthand that it is truly a blessing to give.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Supervisor over contractor sales

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people better them self.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate...and as Margaret Mead said...a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. And I believe these borrowers are just the people to do that.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy to make a positive impact in the world.

lender.name: Lea & Sonny
lender.loan_because: We loan because everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Maritza
lender.loan_because: I saw the Ophra Show where she had President Bill Clinton and I was moved to tears when I heard about KIVA.org and how easy would be to help someone in need. I had to do it!

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place for my son
lender.occupational_info: I make medical devices that help repair shoulder and knee injuries

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I have prospered by working many years. I want to encourage workers.
lender.occupational_info: I worked as a scientist in support of the US Civil service.

lender.name: Kimberlie
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I admire those out there with far less than I have , who have the guts and iniative to get out there and become successful in their chosen field, no matter what.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a fortune 500 Diangnostics Lab. I work in customer service and enjoy helping people who call in.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: the concept of joining together with other people to potentially change people's lives is amazing and fulfilling.

lender.name: Racheal & Eric
lender.loan_because: We both feel its important to give back. Helping others succeed makes us feel so good!
lender.occupational_info: Racheal owns an eco-friendly webstore, and Eric cooks for a small restaurant.

lender.name: Drew & Stephanie
lender.loan_because: We feel lucky to live in Canada, and want to help people who are not so fortunate.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: what better way to spend $25?

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to live in Canada and have a good job. I think we should all give back to others! I have already given 3 gift certificates to friends who have joined. I also told my best friend about KIVA and she started a team. It's AWESOME!!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a clinic setting and care for employees that get injured on the jobsite. I also look after minor health needs such as tonsillitis, sore throats, colds, headaches, sprains, sore backs, etc......

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: making a difference and participating in a global community is important.
lender.occupational_info: I provide sign language interpreting services in order to facilitate communication between people who can hear and people who are deaf.

lender.name: Craig & Annette
lender.loan_because: We absolutely LOVE giving. We truely enjoy the joy it puts in our hearts knowing we're helping do God's work on this earth...he needs us to give from that which he has given us
lender.occupational_info: We own a chiropractic clinic together. Annette is the Doctor and Craig is responsible for Marketing and Public Relations.

lender.name: Andrew Teague
lender.loan_because: While I have had some very meaningful jobs in my career, It is a goal of mine to find an opportunity of a more philanthropic nature helping people around the world. The microfinance model is revolutionary and participating has given me part of what I have been seeking for some time.
lender.occupational_info: I work in computers, technology and the Internet. I have previously worked for a bilingual public library for 13 years, and went on to become CIO at an international research non-profit organization. I am now working with an international software development team.

lender.name: Jeri
lender.loan_because: I am able
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer

lender.name: don
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a gift to work and know what it means not to be financially sufficient as well.
lender.occupational_info: my work is very rewarding as I get to work with people and assist in their lives and projects as a builder.

lender.name: joyce
lender.loan_because: If I can help, then I should.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: in third world countries such a small amount of money can make a very big difference in a person's ability to provide for their family and I can follow the progress of my borrower.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 55 year young grandmother of 5. I am in a transition phase; formerly earned a living as a corporate accountant. I am exploring careers that incorporate more high touch than high tech :-D

lender.name: Jundee
lender.loan_because: I can help someone improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I spend a lot of time on the computer.

lender.name: MFMB
lender.loan_because: After all my travels, I know how fortunate I am. It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: London family
lender.loan_because: Having started a business from scratch, I know first hand how difficult it is to get someone to believe in your dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I own a retail stationery and gift store.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: "I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something that I can do." - Helen Keller

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others as I have been helped. I know the struggle it can be to raise a family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Material analyst for an auotmotive company

lender.name: Jason & Sara
lender.loan_because: We both have had the opportunity to live in 3rd world countries for extended periods of time and feel a connection with people living overseas. Loans like this really do change lives.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a doctor for children

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: Life is hard and it is a nice feeling to help someone achieve their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I cook for small children in a headstart program.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I can...I want to put the money to good use and I can't think of a better way than by helping somebody who REALLY needs it. : )

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have so much as a citizen of the United States. It is only right to share and help those less fortunate who are willing, wanting & capable of providing a better life for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I plan parties for corporations and individuals. I also book entertainment for these events, as well as, planning the theme, menu, invitations, etc.

lender.name: Wesley
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that you can help someone help themselves. If a friend was in need I would like to think I would do at least this much... so why not do this much in the meantime...?
lender.occupational_info: I work for Apple... and have one of those lucky jobs where you get to travel...

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I have been struggling financially most of my life doing work that I enjoyed quite a bit but the jobs were low paying; I never could put any savings away but would donate if I could. Now that I have inherited a little money, I have been allowing my charitable, giving nature a chance to flower.
lender.occupational_info: I am a bit of a gadfly. I sell books on Amazon.com and tutor elementary school kids reading and math skills. Formerly I worked in the hotel industry in San Francisco.

lender.name: Glenn & Gail
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed and think that micro-loans are one of the best way to help others.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I enjoy empowering people to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: It feels wonderful to help people in need help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people become more aware of themselves through the process of self-discovery.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: What goes around, comes around (I borrowed that from someone else, but I believe it's true). I want to share the gifts I've been given with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in an intensive care unit.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: we are all in this world together so we need to extend our hand to others

lender.name: EILEEN S.
lender.loan_because: There are folks all over the world that can use a hand now & then.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.occupation: Client Service Mgr. at a Crisis Pregnancy Center

lender.name: Tunda
lender.loan_because: I Care

lender.name: Roger Cunard
lender.occupational_info: I design websites and write.

lender.name: Chanikia
lender.loan_because: I Love helping out people!!

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: what a wonderful opportunity to give back to from a world of I HAVE. i don't have much money but i have everything else and no children...am trying to pay it forward...
lender.occupational_info: my work is volunteer these days...i take elderly folks to dinners and dances and otherwise help with meals on wheels or wherever i am needed.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to achieve and better their lives. No one makes it through the world alone. We all have had help at one time or another.

lender.name: Jannie
lender.loan_because: I love to help those in need, I feel that helping others God will help us
lender.occupational_info: Being a servant of God

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help to get ahead. My family is so blessed and happy to give.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I would not be where I am in this life without the help of others. I want to make a difference in someone's life that is willing to work hard and has a plan for where their money will go, not just someone expecting something for nothing. I respect all of the people featured on Kiva for being willing to make themselves and their families better by working toward their own business. I believe I have been blessed in my life with many resources and if I can bless someone else by allowing them to have resources that mean something to them, I feel this is what I should do.
lender.occupational_info: My goal is to become a doctor and work in many of the places around the world featured on KIVA, but currently I am in school to become a nurse practitioner. This is very similar to a doctor, I can prescribe medicine, give medical treatment, and diagnose illness but I work under the supervision of another physician.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be able to make a good living
lender.occupational_info: midwifery

lender.name: Josephine
lender.loan_because: I want to help make dreams come true.

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner who struggled in the beginning and knows how it feels to need help.
lender.occupational_info: I make identifying vests for dogs that are teamed with people to help them with disabilities, visiting the sick and lonely and search and rescue.

lender.name: Chelsie
lender.loan_because: We like world change. Thanks Oprah We Saw This On TV
lender.occupational_info: We offer world change by way of comments on our powerful website to get a voice heard.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: My father taught me to help those who are trying to help themselves

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: It is important to to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers at hospitals.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive change to the life of a person across the world. To have that person know and realize that there are indeed others out there in our world who do truly care about them.

lender.name: Jade
lender.loan_because: My husband is started his own business. I understand the struggles, frustrations, joys and determination that go with starting a business. These people are dreaming and not letting anything stop them from going after their dreams. I am sure their neighbors think they are crazy for dreaming so big. But I don't! Dream big and don't stop.
lender.occupational_info: I am a housewife who stays at home with our baby. I also go to college.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance really works to help improve people's lives, and that those of us who have more to share are obligated to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I try to teach people about the power of information.

lender.name: Jane & George
lender.occupation: RETIRED, RETAIL SUPERVISOR SALES AND OPERATIONS
lender.loan_because: It is important for our Grandchildren to see how one person can make a difference by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from the jewelry industry but continue to stay busy by assisting in the high schools and frequently care for my Grandchildren.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: there is nothing better in life than to give back!

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I love.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying finance and philosophy at the University of San Diego.

lender.name: Jim Hall
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and would like to give back. I get much more than I give.
lender.occupational_info: I am Vice President for Wisemar Consulting Firm in Charlotte, NC

lender.name: Ed & Jean
lender.loan_because: we care.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I just want to help in any small way.
lender.occupational_info: I make routing maps on the computer for cable companies

lender.name: wilma
lender.loan_because: I'm thrilled to be able to make a significant, positive impact with even a small amount by our standards!
lender.occupational_info: As a school social worker, I help to reduce the barriers between students and school success. Sometimes that means advocating for the family, providing psychotherapy, arrainging connections with comminity services, providing inservice training to teachers, whatever it takes to help kids be successful. I love it!

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I know through experience and faith that what I give is returned to me tenfold.
lender.occupational_info: I have had many different jobs in my life, but recently I lost my job. I most enjoy helping people.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I was very poor, with three daughters, and lost my home. I needed help, but couldn't find anyone who would help.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a midwife for nearly 20 years, and deliver babies at home.

lender.name: Valerija
lender.loan_because: I'm very hapy what I can help
lender.occupational_info: I'm very hapy!

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: My parents came from Mexico, and we understand the struggles in developing countries. We have also had access to resources and education only dreamt of by our ancestors.
lender.occupational_info: I travel to countries like India, Brazil and Russia to start small factories that produce engine components.

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: i can!
lender.occupational_info: i help others discern what God is doing in their lives.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Because Kiva is such a great idea.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I want to help our neighbors and friends and because somebody helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a community college. I don't really have a job description. I help keep our computers running and updated, I also help students enroll in college and help with their financial aid, regardless of where they attend.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves and by doing so hope it continues to be repeated.
lender.occupational_info: a woman doing what most women do, caring for other people as well as myself and my family

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: I can and I care.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Even though I am on a fixed income and do not have a lot of money coming in, I have much more than some people in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired, I worked for 25 years at a large hospital. I was not a nurse. I worked in the Admitting Dept and in other clerical positions.

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I look at rocks and other data to make maps of the layers of earth below our feet so the comapny I work for can drill for oil.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Julie, RN
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is my duty to help others with a hand up, not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a local state university in the baccalaureate and graduate programs. I specialize in Maternal/Child care, Labor/Delivery and postpartum care. I also work as a Forensics Nurse processing victims and suspects for local law enforcement.

lender.name: Tim and Lori
lender.loan_because: Microfinance really works, and because we are in a position to help others in need.

lender.name: A Mom
lender.loan_because: Everyday my children are safe I want to share that blessing with others. And if I can help someone to provide for their children then they to may feel blessed.

lender.name: Kandi
lender.loan_because: I thought it was a great idea and organization. I think that everyone should give to others.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: it's a small way for me to help others. As a woman with my own business, I want to encourage others to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I have 2 jobs........my first one involves helping students with learning problems. My second job is that of teaching rubber stamping techniques and selling products made by Stampin' Up!

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I know that women have around the world have so much strength and desire to help their families, and all they need is a little help to flourish.

lender.name: Brian & Marguerite
lender.loan_because: Oprah's showcase of giving inspired us to reach out to people across the world to help them achieve their dreams, through modest means.
lender.occupational_info: Brian is a residential architect (he designs houses) and Marguerite is a small animal veterinarian (she provides medical care for dogs and cats).

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: I want to support other creative and ambitious women in the world. I may not have much to loan, but feel privileged to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I make people feel good by helping them look nice. I make myself feel good by making pretty jewelry, pottery and crochet.

lender.name: LaVonna
lender.loan_because: There are only two ways of spreading light-to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.......

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: What goes around, comes around. I believe that all men and women have the right to support themselves and their families with honor and dignity. "All Gods children need travelling shoes." Maya Angelou
lender.occupational_info: When I'm not at home with my husband and two kids, I am at school trying to inspire my students to love writing, not fear or avoid it. I try to teach my kids that they all have an amazing story to tell, and I try to help them. get it down on paper. I teach each student to honor his or her own voice and style. Creative writing is subjective and the one-size-fits-all style of teaching it only leads these young writers to nod out in class or worse, freak out when faced with a blank page. "No one is able to enjoy such feast than the one who throws a party in his own mind." Selma Lagerlf

lender.name: Donna and Graham
lender.occupation: Computer Software Consultant & Wash Plant Operator
lender.loan_because: I own my own business and can appreciate how difficult it can be to fund. I also know how rewarding owning a business is.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. Businesses use computer software to track the amount of business they do, how much people own them and how much they own others. The software I work with helps business's track those numbers.

lender.name: Ann
lender.occupation: Stay at home mom to three boys
lender.loan_because: By chance, I was born in a country where most people don't have to struggle to put food on the table. I feel an obligation to give others the same opportunity.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: At one time I didn't have much. Now I can give back to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I transcribe (type from tape recordings) for Self Realization Fellowship Church of all religions, inspirational talks and services given by Paramahansa Yogananda and SRF ministers. I have been transcribing for them for 35 years.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to make a direct difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Jim, Marta & Max
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to do so much good!
lender.occupational_info: Jim teaches high school and Marta is a retired middle school teacher.

lender.name: Tet
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who needs another chance at life...somebody who wants to make it better for themselves and for the community they live in.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I feel that the best way to make this world a better place is to give give give.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to be a police officer

lender.name: TEANA
lender.loan_because: i want to make the difference in another persons life that is not as lucky as i am to have been born in the land of opportunity
lender.occupational_info: i work in a casino- i watch many people gamble with money they dont have and loose. i feel sad for them but they do have a choice.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: being able to see someone's dream realized is pure happiness.

lender.name: Kluane
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: Work on a computer all day.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It is such a wonderful feeling to help others...pay it forward!!
lender.occupational_info: I collect data for social research,which gives me the opportunity to meet a wide variety of people in all walks of life,and from every level of income.I LOVE this job!

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Every penny helps to build and sustain small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Pharmaceutical R&D

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I have received many blessings in my life and feel a strong obligation to give back to my community and my world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Physician's Assistant who now spends most of my free time volunteering for one thing or another. I really enjoy working with Habitat for Humanity trying to eliminate poverty housing one family at a time. Kiva.org fits into this philospophy of not being able to change everything, but absolutely being able to change SOMETHING!

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because:
"To whom much is given, much is expected."
I have been blessed by others and by God so I'd like to pass that on in some way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and a mother of four kids, and I go to school part-time.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: Helping others in need is the right thing to do. I feel very blessed to be happily married and the mother of a beautiful baby girl. I also feel very fortunate that I am able to work part-time so that I can spend more time with my family.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a registered nurse for a company that focuses on patient education, wellness and prevention for people of all ages living with chronic illness.

lender.name: kathie
lender.loan_because: I appreciate and am grateful for what I have and want to be able to give an opportunity to someone else

lender.name: Aubrey & Dana
lender.loan_because: of the Indomitable Human Spirit

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: My Husband and I have been blessed in our business and we would like to give some of it to help someone in need
lender.occupational_info: We are a painting company. we paint exterior and interior of homes and businesses, We work together everyday and love it.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: Though I know what it is like to struggle financially, I have a pretty good life. I like to be able to help those who are less fortunate than me and are willing to work for their success.

lender.name: Julienne
lender.loan_because: I care :)
lender.occupational_info: I do make-up for film & fashion and special effects!

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who would like to better themselves.

lender.name: S L
lender.loan_because: I received help when I needed it -- now it's my turn.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: If I was in their position I would hope that they would do the same for me, and because I want to help those in need. In doing so, I hope that I am empowering people to be successful in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work part time in a retail store where I sale computers, and other electronics while I go to school full time.

lender.name: Bronwyn
lender.loan_because: it gives me hope.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that gives advice to the US government on how to provide better medical services to people.

lender.name: Karlene
lender.loan_because: I feel that if we are able to help others then we should.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am working on starting a non profit organization to also assist others in need.

lender.name: Kriston
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are both educators. We feel that by teaching the future leaders of our world we can help to make the future a better place for everyone.

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: by doing so, I can reflect the love of Jesus to a total stranger.
lender.occupational_info: I dispatch calls for service for five law enforcement agencies, seven fire departments and two ambulance districts.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: Day in/day out I work in an environment that's all about capital gain. I feel a huge need to make a difference in a person's life. I'm more and more concerned about the human condition rather than sales and revenue.
lender.occupational_info: I am a liaison between our client and the creative team. I develop advertising strategy and lead a creative team for direct marketing.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it's too easy and too important not to.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer systems that make petroleum refineries work.

lender.name: caryn
lender.loan_because: I have been given much so I too must give
lender.occupational_info: social work, teacher, I love to sew

lender.name: Marsha
lender.loan_because: I respect hard work. I continue to build my business from the ground up and I am honoured to help someone else.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me ... and, I want to demonstrate God's love through the resources he has asked me to be accountable for. All the money I have is God's money ... I am simply a manager of what He gives me.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help families trying to better their lives and the lives of the children.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the education field.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: Anyone can make a difference.

lender.name: Bill & Kimberly
lender.loan_because: It makes us feel good to help others and 100% of the funds goes directly to the people who need them.
lender.occupational_info: Both of us are financial professionals and understand a small business person's need for affordable capital.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: To help people who want to help themself.
lender.occupational_info: I write about Africa, a place of which I have great passion. I have been fortunate enough to travel 13 African countries alone. I am a better person each time I touch African soil!

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Lilfe is too short to have to worry about unnecessary struggles. If we would all just give a little, it will affect the world tomorrow in such a huge way.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own an Auction House in a small town in Montana. We re-sale other people's stuff for a small commission.

lender.name: Anu
lender.loan_because: I believe that the best way to help a person is to enable the person to establish a way of life that they can be proud of and pass on to the future generations.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students who attend a university.

lender.name: Kasey
lender.loan_because: I care....
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mom of 2 sweet little girls. I have been married for 21 years.. I also LOVE taking pictures. I took this one on my page of the flower. It's one of my favorites! God Bless you!

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I love assisting in the success of women who have a passion to become independent, a desire to operate their own business and a vision to make a difference in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I currently own and operate a home furnishings consignment business. I consign furniture and accessories from people who no longer need or want them and sell the items in my store to people that do need and want them. It's extremely rewarding and the ultimate in recycling.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: What is better than giving people money? Making them give it back!
lender.occupational_info: My occupation is jogging inside a large hamster wheel to generate power for a regional (and now socialized) financial institution. I am paid in five pound blocks of expired government cheese. I trade these for cigarettes which I subsequently sell to disabled veterans down at the docks.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I like to help small business' succeed
lender.occupational_info: I look after computer networks and make them safe

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I respect people who have small businesses and I understand how difficult it is to keep it going. I like to help people who are trying to make a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities. I would like people all over the world to know that Americans are generous and caring people.
lender.occupational_info: As a marketing professional I am a communicator who specializes in health care marketing. I develop ways for businesses to tell their customers about their business. Sometimes this takes the form of an ad, a brochure, a website, a radio commercial, or a letter that is mailed to customers.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: The money can be reused and reused to help people in diffrent palces
lender.occupational_info: Just doing my job as a citizen of hte world

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we all just need a little help from our friends. I want someone else in the world to feel successful!
lender.occupational_info: I design and decorate sets for TV commercials. It's an incredible job, as I am freelance and get to work with different people & in different environments on a regular basis!

lender.name: Nancy and Mike
lender.loan_because: We want to help to promote independence
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician and my wife is a musician and home maker

lender.name: Stephanie and Max
lender.loan_because: I loan not because I really can afford to, but because I want to; it makes me happy. If I could, I would loan thousands of dollars because it's the right thing to do. I see these faces - they humble me and speak to my heart. It's almost like having family members all across the world - and for me there's nothing like family.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I'm not clever enough to start my own business!
lender.occupational_info: I cook in a bakery/deli in rural Minnesota.

lender.name: Jeff,Holly,and children
lender.loan_because: We want to help

lender.name: Sebastian & DIego
lender.loan_because: our parents want to teach us that helping one another will make the world better. They make loans on our behalf.
lender.occupational_info: our parents work for a major telecommunication company. Sebastian and DIego spend their days laughing, playing, and napping.

lender.name: linda from Indiana
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who is trying to better himself and who has a clear idea of how to do that. I can help with some of the money needs. needed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired foreign language teacher.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place and I love people from all walks of life.
lender.occupational_info: I make the pages that you visit on the internet and help you find them in search engines.

lender.name: Liane
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life by people who believe in me. I believe people who want to improve should be given the opportunity to improve without having to beg or plead. Afterall, we are all brothers and sisters on this planet and in this lifetime. Nothing feels better than unconditional love and support!
lender.occupational_info: I teach 9 and 10 year olds math, spelling, science, the history of California, and how to read for deeper enjoyment and understanding!

lender.name: Ron & Joanna
lender.occupation: Regional Sales Manager & Human Services Manager
lender.loan_because: We feel strongly about empowering people to pursue their dreams! We also what to give individuals the opportunity to support their families! Everyone deserves a chance! Best of luck and much success to all the wonderful businesses that will be started through Kiva!
lender.occupational_info:
I am the Manager of Employment Programs for Easter Seals Crossroads. This organization is a community resource working in partnership with children and adults with disabilities or special needs and their families to promote growth, independence and dignity.
My husband is a North American Sales Manager for a Taiwanese Wire and Cable Company.

lender.name: Angeliki
lender.loan_because: I want to help her and help her children.
lender.occupational_info: 4th grade student

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: My life is blessed in so many ways and I feel certain that sharing is the right thing to do. In order to receive I must give!!!
lender.occupational_info: My work is to ensure that no one ends their life afraid, alone and in pain

lender.name: Flame
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to work. I would like to help others have an easier life and donate an hour of my work.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse, who works in a nursing home, and cares for 30 older people. In my free time, I volunteer for Red Cross and I am also a CASA worker.

lender.name: Bette & Jan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: There is such a great need in the world. The Good Lord has blessed me abundantly and my hearts desire is to bless someone else in realizing their dreams for themselves as well as their family. My hope is that those whom I have blessed through God, they in turn will be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Restaurant Industry and I am a waitress/server. I deal with the general public in making sure you have a pleasurable dining experience and meal.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I should. What else? Well, as the US economy collapses under the brunt of bad lending practices, microloans inspire me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a toy company and make the signs for their stores.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Kayt
lender.loan_because: I have always enjoyed helping others when ever I can.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: need to give back

lender.name: Karyn
lender.loan_because: it's only right to share our bounty with those who are less fortunate. We are all citizens of the same planet, regardless of what country we call home.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the day-to-day operations of a fundraising office in the College of Arts and Sciences at a large research university.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams and make a better life for them and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hotel and manage the Catering Department in Sales and planning of weddings and other special events.

lender.name: Pravin
lender.loan_because: some guy called Gandhi said "Poverty is the worst form of violence". So me no want violence.

lender.name: Siobhan
lender.occupation: Wife & Mother of 2 & Car Wash owner
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of global helpfulness. Let's help everyone be successful and we will be successful...
lender.occupational_info: I'm just like you working hard to raise loving, caring, smart human beings.

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: i've never done something like this before. i hope it helps.
lender.occupational_info: manage a hospital laboratory

lender.name: Silvia
lender.loan_because: Because its better to give than to recieve
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Graphic Designer

lender.name: L Danyetta
lender.loan_because: I love making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help others achieve their personal, leadership and business goals.

lender.name: Viorica
lender.loan_because: As a woman living an extremely fortunate lifestyle, I feel it is my duty to help other women support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Anything I can do to make a difference in the life of someone else brings joy to me, too. I want to loan primarily to people living in Mexico because most of my students come from Mexico and I know how difficult life there can be.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children who are English language learners. I speak Spanish and am able to be a bilingual teacher to my bilingual English/Spanish speakers. I LOVE my job! I get to teach, make a daily difference, be an advocate and a revolutionary! I am so lucky.

lender.name: Acacia
lender.loan_because: It is a very effective way to help a person help himself/herself. Hopefully, extreme poverty can be eliminated one person at a time. I also sponsor children in the third world countries hoping it will help children there break the poverty cycle.
lender.occupational_info: I do project control. My main responsibilities includes handling the financials/forecasting/reporting of a large project team, business control matters, etc.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Price is right wholesale is an on-line clothing store, that provides quality name brand items at affordable prices.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that I can dramatically impact the life of someone with a relatively small amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that rents heavy construction equipment to companies who only need it for a short time.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I know first-hand how much it helps.
lender.occupational_info: I attend school at a university in North Carolina. I'm majoring in Spanish and minoring in Psychology. I love learning different languages and I also like to work at the dry cleaners. I have many wonderful customers that I see each week. I love the advice they give me.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I can. Because I believe that raising a family is hard work and that sometimes you just need a little help to have a happy, healthy family.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bookstore part-time, and I am a hands-on grandmother.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Everyone at some point in their life has had help achieving a dream...I want to give back in honor of those who helped me make my dream a reality. "Dream as though you'll live forever, Live as if you'll die today"
lender.occupational_info: I care for those who need medical attention

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I receive joy and happiness from helping other people out.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate workers to build homes for rich people.

lender.name: Eddie & Elaine
lender.loan_because: We enjoy the excitement of providing opportunities for those who want to improve their lives as well as their communities.
lender.occupational_info: He: Works at a University School of Medicine She: Works for a doctor

lender.name: Andrew and Julie
lender.loan_because: I love the direct effect i can have on someone else's life!

lender.name: Tekla
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to live in a country with free healthcare, a social service system which helps people when they are in need, a banking system that will loan money when you need it and even if you do not. The public school system is free through high school and if you cannot afford to go to University you can get grants and loans. In Canada we find fault with those systems and complain about what is wrong with them instead of appreciating what is right about them. We are only limited by the effort we want to put into our lives to better them. I think it is our obligation to share our good fortune.

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: I think that we all have a gift to give, and if that gift is helping another person have a better life, we gain more than we will ever give!
lender.occupational_info: I help people do things that they sometimes think are too hard or too complicated. I help people with technology.

lender.name: Shelli
lender.loan_because: Individuals around the world deserve the trust and availability of money that will make their lives a little bit easier. Also, I feel like I am making a differene in this world.
lender.occupational_info: In my job I analyze financial information and help my team make decisions about loaning other companies money.

lender.name: Noreen
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to take care of their family.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a nurse and a mother

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I can... and wish more people would
lender.occupational_info: I am a Special Education teacher and take great pleasure in being able to help those who need just a little extra support to "make it" in this world.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want poverty to become history and if loaning $25.00 will make a difference in someone elses life, I am thankful I can be a apart of that change.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to!

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Im a seamstess also and want to help any woman who is in need of money for sewing clothes or etc...
lender.occupational_info: I opened a small business in Tx and I sew alot and I make great gifts

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: a small loan can transform a whole family's life and future. It gives me great joy to aid families around the world in fulfilling their dreams for a livelihood and better life for themselves and their children.

lender.name: antoinette
lender.loan_because: I love helping people
lender.occupational_info: retired after 27 years with at&t. own a property management company and in process of opening a transitional home for girls

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that we have to "give back" some of the benefits we have. I am fortunate to lack nothing--so I should help others who have need.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing to first year college students.

lender.name: SHAHNAZ
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Alex Morgan
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to people who really could use my money.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freshman in college, studying English and Political Science. I plan on going to Law School, and hopefully making a positive impact on this world.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: to give someone a chance
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital

lender.name: carrie
lender.loan_because: You never realize how good you have things, until you learn of someone that nedds just a few dollars to change their life.

lender.name: E.Ita
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all need a little help from our friends.

lender.name: Victoria J
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at being self-sufficient and the opportunity to achieve.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working to better there lives.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want my children to learn generosity by seeing it in action. And faith without works is dead.
lender.occupational_info: I am married, with two young children. I want my children to know there is a big world beyond our borders, and it is full of wonderful people.

lender.name: Kristie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life. God has given me a chance to help someone and I feel it is my responsibility to lend a hand to help a person who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that distributes medical products to hospitals. As a medcial sales rep I work with laboratories in hospitals to make sure they receive the medical products they ordered to use in the lab.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I heard about this on Oprah -- what a great idea! I lived in Liberia as a child, so I'm honored to help someone in a nearby country to build a business!

lender.name: Venesha
lender.loan_because: I can remember the times when 25$ made all the difference in the world for my family. When I was a small child my father served time in jail because another man became violent towards my mother and my father defended her. Unfortunetly my father hurt that man and was found guilty of assult. My mother was expecting her 2nd child, my little sister at that time. My father had been our primary provider. We had nothing. It was because so many people gave to us that we were able to survive. I will never forget those simple acts of kindness.
lender.occupational_info: As a nurse I care for those who can no longer care for themselves. It is draining work, yes. But when my patients or their families thank me for the care I have given, that thanks is all the reward I could ever ask for.

lender.name: jerri
lender.loan_because: I just want to help. I am especially wanting to loan money to people to start their own businesses. This is a wonderful program.I am so glad I found it.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired. I have 15 grandchildren 3 of which are great grandchildren. I am so blessed. by them

lender.name: denise
lender.loan_because: It is what I can do to help another person.

lender.name: Patti ANDERSEN
lender.loan_because: I want to help single or widowed women who are trying to survive the best they can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the "nuts and bolts" of entertainment in Hollywood: how to make a living in "show biz" in front or behind the camera

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: Because I am a human being. I feel that everyone should have a chance to do great things!!
lender.occupational_info: I am happily married with a 4yr old little girl. I am going back to school to study nursing.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because:
When I hear about women in other parts of the world I realize I'm very lucky to live where I do, with financial independence and a good education. I feel like I should spread some of my good luck to women in other countries.
Be well.
lender.occupational_info: I am an electrical engineer, laying out computer chips that are the brains of copy/fax/scan machines.

lender.name: Greta
lender.loan_because: I know the need to want to make your life better and sometimes all you need is for someone else to believe in you!
lender.occupational_info: I sing, I paint, I make music and films, anything that makes me feel good.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student teacher.

lender.name: Larry
lender.occupational_info: I am a corporate trainer and a college professor. I teach technology and computer classes.

lender.name: Mark and Jessica
lender.loan_because: We feel very lucky for our lives. We want to help people around the world achieve their dreams!

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I heard about this organization on the Oprah show and my immediate reaction was - "what a cool thing to do". I enjoy helping people however I can and if this is one way that I can give back to the world and help someone in the process - I love it! I'm impressed with the number of people who are trying to establish their own business. I would love to do that some day, but never thought it possible - but perhaps, maybe someday I will. This is very inspirational!
lender.occupational_info: My work involves engaging and partnering with individuals and groups every day. I manage all of our supervisory, leadership and management training. As well, I help organizations become more effective through providing organization development support.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: it is a small thing that can have a big impact!!

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that through some hard-work, life has been good to me. I hope that by being a member of Kiva I can help someone else get ahead in life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the Finance and Administration for an HIV Research Center

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: Because we are blessed. When we were struggling, Christian friends helped us & now we are able to bless someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a home educator to our teenage son. We choose to keep our son at home and teach him our own family values.

lender.name: Cindy and Bruce
lender.loan_because: To help others realize their dreams and better their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: Education

lender.name: Kathlene
lender.occupational_info: Helping businesses to optimize their process operations to provide products while being environmentally responsible.

lender.name: Josie630
lender.loan_because: I would hope someone would help me, if need be.
lender.occupational_info: Blessed

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: When you bless others, you always receive more blessings in return. The true value of giving is knowing your gift has given value to the life of another.
lender.occupational_info: I do all I can to protect our earth and bring love to all.
